executable.title: Graph Kernel Computation (TubeTK)
executable.description: Computes a (p.d.) kernel matrix K of similarity values between two collections of input graphs. \ Given a list A of N graphs and a list B of M graphs, the K(i,j)-th entry of K contains the similarity \ value among the i-th graph of A and the j-th graph of B. K will eventually be a N x M matrix.
executable.acknowledgements: This work is part of the TubeTK project at Kitware

file.name: argOutputKernel
file.description: Basename for output kernel (will write .bin, .libsvm files).

integer.name: argDefaultLabelType
integer.description: If no label file is associated with graphs (i.e., a file with .vertexLabel suffix) given, this specifies the default node labeling strategy (0 ... Node ID, 1 ... Node degree).
